comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Hey Frenz, I'm rattling at the bit and chomping the cage for true. Let me know if you want to get away. I'm leaving at 12:45-ish.

comments.author: Dave
comments.body:
Even though they both love the Dark Lord like a brother*, Noel and DU agreed that a day of biking clear and free of SB's shadow was an unexpected relief.

 Noel enjoyed the civilized pace, and found that hanging back w/ DU provided a good introduction to "micromovement," the latest craze to hit cycling. , whose ears still rang from his last outing w/ He Who Shall Not Be Named ("Spin, Donkey Legs, spin!," "You look like a Q-Tip in Spandex!," "Allez, Allez, Allez, Lard Butt!!!"), enjoyed the first intelligent conversation he's had over handlebars in years. Syllables! Content! Purpose!

 Breezy on Flag today, but not enough to defeat the rising temps. Looks as if we'll be suffering a good deal more before Fall's welcome arrival.   

 * _The one in the attic that the family refers to as "Bump."_
